page.title: 11LA MIELLE DE MORVILLE
page.content:
This is a major area of recreation and it is situated opposite the Kempt Tower in the south of the block.
Old refuse tips have been recontoured and planted with grass to make them look like dunes. The wildlife has been encouraged back to this area.
The needs of the car driver have not been forgotten and it is possible to drive into the area and sunbathe or have a picnic near where the car has been parked out of sight of most other people using the area.
Local people and tourists alike can now enjoy what used to be a derelict area without feeling over crowded and without doing any damage to the interesting and essential wildlife which has started to return here.
